channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: Giulio Erasmus & Band + Torx + Horizontaler Gentransfer + NMT
item.description: 05 Sept 2024 Küfa/dinner: 18h30 Show: 19h30 Giulio Erasmus + Band mutant discodub funk / BXL BC Torx (tape release + splitter records label launch) crooked punk / Leipzig IG Horizontaler Gentransfer exp. k-pop research / Stutti IG SF NMT The new solo project of rébecca bonté, also part of the lo-fi pop duo acte bonté. Midlife aesthetic crisis with screaming attempts, various noise strata and velocious kick variations. Disjointed pop songs mainly guided by fear and shyness.

item.title: KUMPELA Soli-Party
item.description: Save the date! We’re happy to host the next KUMPELA Soli Party at the Ränch:: Sat, 17th August Minigolf + Waffles + Cool Drinks + DJs + FUN from 16h00 outside / concerts from 20h00 inside. Kumpela ist eine feministische Gruppe aus Leipzig, die Menschen aus Polen und überall her Unterstützung und Begleitung zu sicheren Schwangerschaftsabbrüchen anbietet. KUMPELA Leipzig LIVE::: SPITPLAY [] Alien Goth Pop | Berlin ] Martina from C*ntroaches new project!
